1013.issue: [W1013] Please test whether adapter can support compact mode, if not set "common.compact:false" at [io-package.json](https://github.com/mcdhrts/ioBroker.asuswrt/blob/master/io-package.json).

1056.issue: [W1056] js-controller 5.0.19 listed as dependency but 6.0.11 is recommended. Please consider updating dependency at [io-package.json](https://github.com/mcdhrts/ioBroker.asuswrt/blob/master/io-package.json).

4036.issue: [S4036] Consider adding .vscode/settings.json file with JSON schema definitions for better development experience with Visual Studio Code.

5022.issue: [S5022] Please consider migrating to admin 5 UI (jsonConfig) or react based UI.

9006.issue: [S9006] .commitinfo file should be excluded by .gitignore, please add a line with text ".commitinfo" to .gitignore

0028.issue: [W0028] Minimum node.js version 20 recommended. Please adapt "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '18' } }" to "{'engines' : { 'node' >= '20' } }" at [package.json](https://github.com/mcdhrts/ioBroker.asuswrt/blob/master/package.json).
